# God of misfortune in the Japanese [[Shintō]] religion. Also known as {{l|ja|八十禍津日神}} (alternate spelling {{l|ja|八十枉津日神}}, {{l|ja|やそまがつひのかみ}}, ''Yasomagatsuhi-no-kami'') or {{l|ja|大禍津日}} (alternate spelling {{l|ja|大枉津日}}, {{l|ja|おおまがつひのかみ}}, ''Ōmagatsuhi-no-kami''), which may in certain traditions be considered as two separate gods of misfortune.
